entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
